description:
Tree works subject to a Tree Preservation Order.

Tree Preservation Application At:

17 Compton Terrace, Islington, London, N1 2UN

TPO Reference:

T13 – Sycamore of LBI TPO (No.287) 2007
T14– Sycamore of LBI TPO (No.287) 2007
T15– Ash of LBI TPO (No.287) 2007


PO Number:

T100317

Work specifications:

1 x Sycamore (T13 next to shed) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.287) 2007
Lift to 6m, cut back laterals towards the house by up to 1.5m and remove deadwood. 
1 x Sycamore (T14 next to Union Chapel) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.287) 2007
Lift to 4m from ground level and remove deadwood. 
1 x Ash (T15) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.287) 2007
Cut back branches growing towards the building by up to 1m and remove deadwood.
decision_conditions: The tree officer agreed on site with Patrick the landscape designer that they would not remove the Ash, but reduce it in size. The tree surgeon was informed via e mail of the changes.
